title: Coronavirus: When will we know the UK lockdown is working?
description: Almost two weeks after Britons were confined to their homes, is the coronavirus curve flattening?
content:
Image copyrightJeff Overs/BBC
It's two weeks since Boris Johnson announced the UK's lockdown, and there are signs the rate of infection is starting to slow, though not deaths.
While the number of people dying in hospital with coronavirus is doubling every f… [+4739 chars]
